'''16w05a''' is the fifty-second [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on February 3, 2016.<ref name="blogpost_16w05a">https://www.mojang.com/2016/02/minecraft-snapshot-16w05a/</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Trapped chest]]'''
* Recipe is now shapeless.

=== Entities ===
'''[[Boat]]s'''
* Now travel fast on [[ice]] and [[packed ice]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=16w05a|prefix=Minecraft

|;dev
|91620|Boats full speed on pressure plates.
|;previous

|96199|Duplicated "Realms Notifications" button in main menu options.
